channel.title: IceRealm Client
channel.description: Okay so ive been messing around with the IceRealm Client mabey using some of the sprites and such. I am Just wondering how would i make max money go to 2147m on my server, my source is Ownage Pk based source and the maximum amount of Gold is 999M Someone explain how to change this please? thanks - Mikey :eek: ;)
